attributes.action: Ban solicitors from using misleading advertising and falsely claiming LSC funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop solicitors from misleading the public that they can take medical negigence cases when they cannot do judicial reviews which is required if you are currently suffering due to medical negligence- if you are you're on your own - the clinical negligence panel appear not to do any judical reviews, taking simple historical cases only and not informing clients until after LSC funding is secured - let's Stop medical negligence lawyers calling themselves such when they are not able to conduct judicial reviews if a client is still not receiving the medical care they need - they are professional negligence but NOT medical negligence solicitors therefore misleading the public and fleecing the tax - payer thousands of pounds into some cases they then go on to drop due to be 'unqualified' to continue
